CustomField.formula: AND( upper(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'UK', upper(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'ES', upper(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'DE', upper(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'FR', upper(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'IT', UPPER(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'UNITED KINGDOM', UPPER(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'DEUTSCHLAND', UPPER(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'GERMANY', UPPER(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'FRANCE', UPPER(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'ITALY', UPPER(Account.EBH_BillingCountry__c) <>'SPAIN')
CustomField.label: Is ROE
